Welcome To Hartleys Supermarket

Nigeria’s Favorite Supermarket.

Discover the ultimate shopping experience near you. At Hartleys Supermarket, fresh is a promise we keep. With our wide range of quality products, locally & internationally sourced. We are competitively priced and guarantee a smile in every aisle.

About Us
Contact Us

About Us

Hartleys Supermarket is your one-stop shop for all your grocery needs. With a wide range of products from local and international brands, you can be sure to find everything you need at competitive prices. Our friendly staff and convenient location make shopping a breeze, and our commitment to quality ensures that you always get the freshest and best products available. Whether you’re stocking up on household essentials or picking up a few treats for yourself, Hartleys is the perfect choice for all your shopping needs.

Learn More

EXPLORE HARTLEYS SUPERMARKET

Discover a World of Shopping Delight. Browse Our Exciting Categories Today!

Learn more

Find Us

Come visit HARTLEYS today to explore the delicious taste of Nigeria and beyond. With our wide selection of products available both in-store and online, you’ll be sure to find something that satisfies your taste buds and leaves you craving for more!

The Quality is top-notch, and the staffs are always ready to offer suggestions. i don’t know what i’d do without this store.

JUDITH

Having a farmers’ market and a gourmet butcher in one place is nothing short of amazing.

CHRIS

Their online ordering is a game-changer. I can submit my list and have everything delivered within hours. It’s a true time saver.
